name: 2D platformer (Jace5)
description:
Hey there,

I made a game for an assignment, and I need playtesters.

The game is a simple 2D platformer, with a 'barrier' in the middle. On the other side of the barrier, something changes.

I also made a small survey: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/C5IYV0/
